algebraDomain

Class MathUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • algebraDomain.MathUtilities

  • public class MathUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of methods that perform basic algebraic operations, using regular expressions. Note that this is domain dependent code, so code has to be written for each new domain you write a cognitive model for.
    Author:
    Nikolaos Barmpalios {nbarmpalios@gmail.com}
